methodologyText: Skills in Vehicle Engine Cooling Systems (7290-702)
methodologyNotes: Assessor Observation Recording Form - Candidate must achieve all practical assignment requirements listed below to successfully achieve a Pass.
technicalData:

Thermostat opening temperature: [To be recorded]

customerRequests.text: 2. Measure coolant frost protection / anti-freeze level
3. Remove and replace engine cooling system thermostat

tasks.description: Ensured that the engine was not hot
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Temperature checked ___°C, Safe to proceed ___

tasks.description: Removed the coolant cap
photos: Upload a picture of the removed coolant cap
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Coolant cap location ___, Condition ___

tasks.description: Placed the coolant pressure tester on the expansion tank
photos: Upload a picture of the pressure tester fitted
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Tester type ___, Connection secure ___

tasks.description: Pumped to system pressure as per pressure cap specification (1bar typical)
photos: Upload a picture of the pressure gauge reading
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: System pressure cap specification ___ bar, Pressure achieved ___ bar, Date/Time ___

tasks.description: Visually checked for leaks whilst ensuring there was no drop in pressure
photos: Upload a picture of any leaks found (if present)
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Pressure before check ___ bar, Pressure after check ___ bar, Leaks detected ___, Location ___

jobs.requestText: Measure coolant frost protection / anti-freeze level

tasks.description: Ensured that the engine was not hot
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Temperature checked ___°C, Safe to proceed ___

tasks.description: Removed the coolant cap
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Cap location ___, Condition of coolant ___

tasks.description: Used a hydrometer to suck up coolant into the hydrometer bulb
photos: Upload a picture of the hydrometer with coolant sample
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Hydrometer type ___, Sample taken successfully ___

tasks.description: Looked at how many floats were floating and checked against specification
photos: Upload a picture of the hydrometer floats reading
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Floats floating ___, Specification requirement ___, Reading matches specification ___ (Yes/No), Frost protection level ___°C

jobs.requestText: Remove and replace engine cooling system thermostat

tasks.description: Placed a coolant drain bowl under the car
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Location ___

tasks.description: Disconnected the lower coolant pipe and drained the coolant
photos: Upload a picture of the disconnected pipe draining coolant
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Coolant drained approximately ___ litres, Condition of coolant ___

tasks.description: Removed the air filter to create more room in the engine bay
photos: Upload a picture of the removed air filter
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Filter type ___, Condition ___

tasks.description: Removed the thermostat and coolant temperature sensor
photos: Upload a picture of the removed thermostat and sensor
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Housing bolt torque setting ___, Bolts removed using ___, Thermostat type ___, Gasket condition ___

tasks.description: Placed thermostat and temperature sensor into hot water and brought water up to thermostat opening temperature
photos: Upload a picture of the test setup with temperature reading
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Opening temperature specification ___, Actual temperature at opening ___, Sensor resistance at temperature ___Ω

tasks.description: Refitted new thermostat with new gasket and reconnected temperature sensor
photos: Upload a picture of the refitted components
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: New gasket material ___, Torque setting applied ___ Nm, Pipes reconnected and secured ___

tasks.description: Refilled cooling system with correct coolant mixture and bled air from system
photos: Upload a picture of coolant refilling process
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Coolant type/specification ___, Capacity refilled ___ litres, Air bled successfully ___, System pressure tested ___

tasks.description: Removed and tested cooling system electrical components
photos: Upload a picture of the multimeter testing the sensor
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Component tested ___, Test type ___, Readings: Cold ___Ω at ___°C, Hot ___Ω at ___°C

tasks.description: Checked cooling fan relay operation
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Relay location ___, Fan engagement temperature ___°C, Operation correct ___ (Yes/No)

tasks.description: Verified temperature gauge sender is functioning correctly
tasks.learnerNotes: Record: Gauge reading accuracy ___, Functional across range ___ (Yes/No)

tasks.description: Selected and used correct Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
tasks.learnerNotes: PPE used: ___ (e.g., Safety glasses, Gloves, Overalls)

tasks.description: Communicated effectively with assessor/team
tasks.learnerNotes: Communication demonstrated: ___ (Clear explanations, Asked for clarification, Reported findings)

tasks.description: Maintained positive working relationships
tasks.learnerNotes: Relationships maintained: ___ (Cooperated, Respectful, Professional)

tasks.description: Identified and managed hazards
tasks.learnerNotes: Hazards identified: ___ (Hot engine, Pressurised system, Coolant disposal)

tasks.description: Maintained environmental/sustainability practices
tasks.learnerNotes: Practices demonstrated: ___ (Proper coolant disposal, Waste recycling, No spillage)

tasks.description: Completed work within agreed timescales
tasks.learnerNotes: Start time: ___, Finish time: ___, Tasks completed: ___ (On time/Early/Late)

tasks.description: Selected the correct tools for each task
tasks.learnerNotes: Tools selected appropriately for: Pressure testing ___, Anti-freeze testing ___, Thermostat removal ___

tasks.description: Used tools correctly and safely throughout
tasks.learnerNotes: Torque wrench used correctly ___, Multimeter handled correctly ___, Other tools used safely ___

tasks.description: Cleaned tools after use
tasks.learnerNotes: Tools cleaned: ___ (Yes/No), Method used ___

tasks.description: Checked tools for damage and correct function
tasks.learnerNotes: Tools checked: ___ (Yes/No), Condition: All satisfactory ___ / Damage noted ___

tasks.description: Stored tools correctly and securely
tasks.learnerNotes: Storage location: ___, Storage method: ___, Security: ___
